summary: A small ini tweak, that adjusts the autoaim and increases the range, at which you can hit targets for damage.
descriptionHtml:
Is the auto-aim \"feature\" and the limited range taking away from you enjoying the game? Then simply open and edit the skyrim.ini under documents/my games/skyrim with notepad 
and adjust the following settings:


[Combat]
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

This setting will force the arrow to start from the middle
of the cross hair, then drop down from gravity. 

The 0 setting starts the arrow below the cross hair.


[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=14000.0000

This setting increases the range at which you will be able hit.


PS: I have no idea, if this tweak has any other side effects,
but so far i did not notice anything. 

So please use it with care.
author: Nadimos
